body.raw:
{
    "grade": "666b510e00af65249616e250",
    "subject": "66b3d6bf935d0e0a6cf48f92",

    "topic": "66b3dcff6d5a262329f94792",
    "lesson": "66b3f6959a7d59ca4f572d2e",

    "startsAt": "2024-08-12T08:00:00",
    "endsAt": "2024-06-12T09:00:00",
    "score": 10,
    "questions": [
        {
            "question": "What is the first step in the scientific research process?",
            "options": [
                "Analyzing data",
                "Drawing conclusions",
                "Identifying the problem",
                "Conducting experiments"
            ],
            "answer": "Identifying the problem",
            "time": 60
        },
       {
            "question": "What should you do before forming a hypothesis?",
            "options": [
                "Conduct an experiment",
                "Analyze data",
                "Gather information",
                "Draw conclusions"
            ],
            "answer": "Gather information",
            "time": 60
        },
        {
            "question": "What type of information should you look for when gathering data for your research?",
            "options": [
                "Unreliable sources",
                "Opinions",
                "Reputable sources",
                "Fictional stories"
            ],
            "answer": "Reputable sources",
            "time": 60
        },{
            "question": "What is a hypothesis?",
            "options": [
                "A random guess",
                "A detailed conclusion",
                "An educated guess",
                "A known fact"
            ],
            "answer": "An educated guess",
            "time": 60
        },{
            "question": "Which of the following is an example of collecting data?",
            "options": [
                "Predicting the outcome of an experiment",
                "Reading scientific journals",
                "Measuring plant growth",
                "Formulating a problem"
            ],
            "answer": "Measuring plant growth",
            "time": 60
        },{
            "question": "Why is it important to document observations during experiments?",
            "options": [
                "To have a record for analysis",
                "To make the experiment longer",
                "To use up supplies",
                "To impress the teacher"
            ],
            "answer": "To have a record for analysis",
            "time": 60
        }

        ,{
            "question": "What does analyzing data help you understand?",
            "options": [
                "How to conduct experiments",
                "Whether your hypothesis is supported",
                "How to write a hypothesis",
                "How to identify a problem"
            ],
            "answer": "Whether your hypothesis is supported",
            "time": 60
        },{
            "question": "Which step comes immediately after conducting experiments?",
            "options": [
                "Drawing conclusions",
                "Observing and collecting data",
                "Formulating a hypothesis",
                "Gathering information"
            ],
            "answer": "Observing and collecting data",
            "time": 60
        },{
            "question": "What is the purpose of drawing conclusions in the scientific process?",
            "options": [
                "To start the research process",
                "To summarize your findings",
                "To decide on the problem",
                "To choose an experiment"
            ],
            "answer": "To summarize your findings",
            "time": 60
        }
        ,{
            "question": "What should a good experiment be able to do?",
            "options": [
                "Prove a hypothesis beyond doubt",
                "Be repeated with the same results",
                "Use a lot of resources",
                "Take a long time to complete"
            ],
            "answer": "Be repeated with the same results",
            "time": 60
        }
    ]
}
